results.name: Cross-Session Recall

steps.description: Session 1 (Tuesday): User states language constraint with decision record ID and nonce

response.response:
Based on the provided decision record, the key points are:

1. The project will use Java only, and Python was rejected for this integration project. [#1]
2. This decision (ARCH-22B) with nonce N-19C8 is final and should not be reopened. [#1]

I will not paste any raw memory blocks or labels, and I will synthesize the information in my own words.
